CustomField.inlineHelpText: The representation of the measure of how much an account is behaving like accounts with which there is a history of previously opened opps. Target - Buyer may not realize a problem exists, but may fit within the sellerâ€™s TAM Awareness - Buyer realizes they have a problem. The buyer is doing educational research Consideration - Buyer defines their problem & researches options to solve it Decision - Buyer chooses a solution Purchase - Buyer commits to a solution & justifies the reasons for purchase
CustomField.label: 6sense Account Buying Stage
